data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Duckens Nazon puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 37, Great play from Oleksandr Filippov to set up the goal.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Staaien.
In the minute 54, Aleksandar Boljevic is on a sub for Eddy Sylvestre for Liege.
Duckens Nazon (St. Truidense) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Facundo Colidio.
Selim Amallah (Liege) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 68, Philippe Montanier is making the team's second substitution at Staaien with Obbi Oulare replacing Duje Cop.
The home team replace Yuma Suzuki with Tatsuya Ito.
Philippe Montanier (Liege) is making a third substitution, with Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez replacing Jackson Muleka.
In the minute 73, St. Truidense take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Steve De Ridder.
Facundo Colidio instrumental with a fine assist.
St. Truidense's Steve De Ridder has been booked in Sint- Truiden.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Oleksandr Filippov with Seung-Woo Lee. This is the third substitution made today by Kevin Muscat.
